name: Magic Scroll
description:
Magic Scroll is an addictive game based on physics and destruction. You have to destroy various structures with a pickaxe! In the game you will find many exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.
Control your pickaxe and destroy everyone on your way! There are many unique buildings waiting for you in the game, so destroy them all!

Game Features:
- Multi-level
- Complete destruction of objects
- Physics
- Colorful graphics
